item.title: Azure Disk Encryption for Linux VMs
item.description: Azure provides disk encryption option for Iaas virtual machines, this is a perfect solution for those who want to keep data encrypted with own keys. Some aspects I would like to clarify here to have a more transparent solution. I have tested and implemented this solution. Ok, lets have some fun…
